product_piracy_regulations.general_description: Strict prohibition on importing or exporting counterfeit trademarks and counterfeit designs through Swiss customs territory, including tourist traffic goods for personal use.

illegal.description: Product piracy activities that are strictly prohibited with immediate enforcement

items.description: Importing goods with counterfeited trademarks into Swiss customs territory
items.reason: Violation of intellectual property rights and trademark laws
items.scope: All imports regardless of purpose or quantity

items.description: Importing goods with counterfeited designs into Swiss customs territory
items.reason: Violation of design rights and intellectual property protection
items.scope: All imports regardless of purpose or quantity

items.description: Exporting goods with counterfeited trademarks from Swiss customs territory
items.reason: Violation of intellectual property rights and international trade laws

items.description: Exporting goods with counterfeited designs from Swiss customs territory
items.reason: Violation of design rights and international trade laws

items.description: Transporting counterfeit goods through Swiss customs territory in transit
items.reason: Switzerland enforces anti-counterfeiting laws even for goods in transit

items.description: Tourist traffic goods with counterfeit trademarks or designs for personal use
items.reason: No exemption for personal use - strict prohibition applies universally
items.scope: Tourist traffic and personal use items

items.description: Previously used goods with counterfeit trademarks or designs
items.reason: Condition of goods (new or used) is irrelevant to counterfeiting laws
items.scope: Both new and used counterfeit goods

restricted.description: Product authenticity verification and border control measures

items.description: Goods suspected of being counterfeit subject to detailed inspection
Enforcement of registered trademarks and designs at borders
items.conditions: Active enforcement for registered intellectual property

items.description: Goods with unclear or disputed authenticity status
items.conditions: Held pending resolution of authenticity disputes

legal.description: Authentic goods and legitimate trade activities

items.description: Genuine products bearing legitimate trademarks authorized by rights holders
items.conditions: Verified authentic products with proper authorization

items.description: Genuine products with original designs authorized by rights holders
items.conditions: Verified authentic products with original designs

items.description: Products without trademark claims that do not infringe on protected designs
Products manufactured under proper licensing agreements with rights holders
items.conditions: Valid licensing agreements and proper authorization

important_notes.strict_prohibition: Counterfeits are strictly prohibited with no exceptions
important_notes.universal_application: Rules apply to import, export, and transit through Swiss customs territory
important_notes.no_personal_use_exception: Tourist traffic goods for personal use are also subject to prohibition
important_notes.condition_irrelevant: New or used status does not affect counterfeiting laws
important_notes.immediate_enforcement: Counterfeits may be confiscated and destroyed when crossing the border
important_notes.comprehensive_scope: Applies to both trademark and design counterfeits
important_notes.zero_tolerance: No quantity threshold - any amount of counterfeits is prohibited
